pr_title: Fix accidentally broken travis tests that travis neglected to warn about...

timeline.author: lbergelson
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -123,6 +123,7 @@ install:
 script:
 # run a basic sanity check to be sure that gatk doesn't explode
 # run tests
+# Because the docker build for GATK doesn't include the test code or the src files we have to manually collect them into a location to be mounted in for performing tests

replies.bodyText: I wish "travis script can't be parsed" showed up as a test failure on travis...
replies.author: jamesemery
